summary: Human-friendly evaluation display feature testing completed. All three target components (EvidenceModal, DrillMode, JourneyV2) now display human-readable chess evaluations instead of raw engine numbers.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - minor accessibility warning, not blocking

evidence_modal_eval_display.details: EvidenceModal shows 'Completely winning' instead of '+X.X' format. Confirmed via screenshot and text extraction.

evidence_modal_mistake_severity.details: EvidenceModal shows 'Blunder', 'Serious mistake', 'Mistake' instead of '-XXX cp' format.

drill_mode_eval_display.details: DrillMode shows 'You were Completely winning' instead of '+9.3' format.

drill_mode_result_screen.details: DrillMode result screen shows 'In the game, you played Bb6 (Blunder)' instead of cp loss.

journey_v2_total_cp_loss.details: JourneyV2 shows '374 pawns lost (major weakness)' and '15 pawns lost (major weakness)' instead of '~XXX cp lost'.

eval_formatter_utility.details: evalFormatter.js provides: formatEvalToWords, formatEvalWithContext, formatCpLoss, formatTotalCpLoss. All functions working correctly.

critical_code_review_comments: evalFormatter.js: Well-designed utility with clear evaluation scale (0-0.3 Equal, 0.3-1.0 Slight edge, 1.0-2.0 Clear advantage, 2.0-4.0 Winning, 4.0+ Completely winning)
formatCpLoss: Properly handles both centipawn (100cp = 1 pawn) and pawn unit inputs with cp > 10 check
formatTotalCpLoss: Converts centipawns to pawns and adds context like '(significant)' and '(major weakness)'
All components properly import and use the new formatters from @/utils/evalFormatter
seed_data_creation: No new seed data. Used existing user with analyzed games.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Human-friendly eval display feature fully implemented and tested. The evalFormatter.js utility provides all formatting functions. Key transformations: '+X.X' -> 'Completely winning/Winning/Clear advantage/Slight edge/Equal', '-XXX cp' -> 'Blunder/Serious mistake/Mistake/Inaccuracy/Minor inaccuracy', '~XXX cp lost' -> 'X pawns lost (major weakness/significant)'.
